long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
HiredEasy is a powerful Chrome extension designed to streamline the process of assigning jobs to agents directly from LinkedIn. 

Hire a Personal Assistant for Your Job Search Let them apply to job openings on your behalf using tailored resumes and cover letters, allowing you to concentrate on networking and preparing for interviews.

Less than 2% of job applications lead to interview opportunities. Invest your time and energy where it matters most.

Our assistants help you reclaim over 100 hours of tedious work.
